Inditex and BASF have developed a detergent that reduces the abrasion of microfibers. This means that the textiles last longer. It can now be purchased in Zara Home stores as well as on online platforms in most European countries. 
More information: https://t.co/61R3Ntpw7w https://t.co/HsjpBnfgnr

The DEP announced a proposed voluntarily Natural Resource Damages agreement with BASF Corp. that will permanently preserve and protect 1,000 acres of the former Ciba-Geigy chemical plant in Toms River. 

To submit a public comment or for more info, go to: https://t.co/8B68ASOyI1 https://t.co/UXf4UN0qb4
BASF to restore polluted Superfund site in New Jersey https://t.co/TEQ1cArY6d

BASF, the largest chemical producer in the world, is collaborating with LSU chemical engineers to better understand and predict its own production ebbs and flows using AI.

Read more: https://t.co/GxnpYNQPU6

#ScholarshipFirst #LSUWorks https://t.co/GZyBm5nuID

For the past 30 years, Lori Goucher, has slowly yet steadily helped reshape the manufacturing industry, opening the doors to more diversity and inclusion. 

Learn more about her story - https://t.co/NGx9zggnQG https://t.co/ubxpcCTjsY

On #InternationalVolunteerDay we celebrate volunteers around the globe who contribute to society. Our employees are also involved in many volunteer projects. We are proud of this! Find more information here: https://t.co/Xd4cM7qotm https://t.co/FrmKfJWecu
